column2: FOXTROT BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. SEND IN THE REINFORCEMENTS. OVER.
PAPA BEAR THIS IS FOXTROT. LZ IS CLEAR. I REPEAT, LZ IS CLEAR.
CLOSING THE INSERTION POINT. OK GUYS, GET READY. OVER.
PAPA BEAR THIS IS ALPHA BLACK. TROOPS INSERTED. RETURNING TO BASE. OVER.
GOLF BLACK TO FOXTROT BLACK. WE ARE ONLY FEW MOMENTS AWAY. HANG IN THERE. OVER.
COPY THAT FOXTROT. CALL IN THE BLACKHAWKS. OVER.
THIS IS PAPA BEAR. ARMOR MOVEMENT DETECTED ENROUTE TO LA RIVIERE. M1A1 PLATOON IS ENROUTE TO SUPPORT YOUR. OVER.
